modName: Mjoll The Lioness Re-placer_Companion UUNP - DELETED

descriptionHtml:
Slight bug when follower dialogue is initiated and she doesn't follow. Just pick a fight with a guard or someone and afterwards she follows. Also screens do not reflect actual body size as that is the armor making boobs and stuff bigger.Â

Combat Class: 2h
Raised melee and Ranged combat style
Speed raised to 165
Can be married.

Lazy on fancy description.
